main event: A round, white object with a long exhaust was observed flying in a straight line in Lawton, Oklahoma on September 22, 1953.
interesting points: The object was tracked flying from southeast to northwest., The sighting was noted by a Captain and several unidentified civilians., The object's exhaust was described as three times the length of the object itself., The report concluded that the information was too sketchy for a proper analysis., The document is part of the Project Blue Book investigation.
sighted object: a round, white object with a long exhaust
witness description: Captain and several unidentified civilians living in the vicinity
